column3: Language name (in native language).  This means the NAME OF THE LANGUAGE BEING TRANSLATED INTO, and should NOT be a translation of the word 'English'

column2: 오래된 Klyte45d의 교통 노선 관리자를 삭제해주시고, t1a2l'의 버전으로 업데이트를 해주셔야 완벽한 지원이 됩니다.
Your settings seem to have issues that may affect your experience.
이 메시지는 모드가 업데이트 되었음을 알려드리기 위한 것입니다.
For a detailed list of changes, please visit the Steam Workshop or GitHub.
First Person Camera v2의 설정(모드 설정과 오프셋 설정 포함)을 불러오시겠습니까? 기존 모드 설정을 덮어쓰고 가져온 오프셋 설정을 기존 설정과 병합합니다.
When exiting FPS Camera, set the camera position back to where it's left beforehand
Scaling factor of info panel's height
The maximum degree to rotate camera up & down.
Enable position detection for pedestrian paths
This option is used to update the camera position more precisely. {0}Disable if it does not work well with Steam Workshop assets

For Free-Camera Mode:{0}-[None] free movement{0}-[Above ground] camera always above ground{0}-[Snap to ground] camera sticks to ground{0}-[Above road] camera always above the closest road{0}-[Snap to road] camera sticks to the closest road or ground
Vertical offset for ground level for ground clipping option
Vertical offset for road level for ground clipping option
Fixed camera offset for vehicle in the middle
Use secondary mouse click to switch following targets instead.
Auto moving toggle in Free-Camera mode
Camera moves forward automatically when it's toggled on.
In Follow/Walk-Through mode, save the current camera setting \n for the followed target
Toggle main panel (need to subscribe to UUI mod)
When camera moves, rotates or zooms, the transition could be either smooth or instant.{0}Enabling the option could make camera look lagging.
In Follow Mode, camera needs to move instantly with the target even when smooth transition is enabled.{0}This sets the minimum distance to start applying smooth transition.
When the camera target position is too far, smooth transition takes too long.{0}This number sets the distance to give up the transition.
Field of View scaling factor by scrolling
Adjusting the speed of scroll wheel scaling in the FPS Camera
Max duration for exiting FPS Camera

When FPS Camera is enabled:{0}-[Disabled] Disable LOD optimization{0}-[Low] Optimize LOD distances only for distant citizens, vehicles, trees, and roads{0}-[Medium] Further optimize distant props and buildings based on the previous level{0}-[High] Further reduce LOD distances based on the previous level
When the FPS Camera is enabled, perform shadows distance adjustment.
